org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator

Class PortfolioConstructionParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator.PortfolioConstructionParameters
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundedPortfolioConstructionParameters

    public class PortfolioConstructionParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    PortfolioConstructionParameters holds the Parameters needed to construct the Portfolio.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
